description: starter minikube dashboard for performance testing with JVM and DB stats along with gatling metrics

targets.expr: ((sum(pg_settings_max_connections) by (server) - sum(pg_settings_superuser_reserved_connections) by (server)) - sum(pg_stat_activity_count) by (server)) / sum(pg_settings_max_connections) by (server) * 100

title: keycloak-perf-tests
